snippet: The coach known for the Miracle on Ice at the 1980 Olympics has a legacy that touches all five universities playing Division I hockey in the state....
abstract: Profile of late hockey coach Herb Brooks, who is best known for leading United States Olympic hockey team to gold medal in 1980 at Lake Placid; Brooks later went to influence collegiate hockey in his home state of Minnesota, where he successfully lobbied State Legislature to fund campus hockey stadium for St Cloud University, which jumped to Division 1 hockey four years ahead of schedule; Minnesota now boasts five teams on NCAA's Division I men's ice hockey team rankings.
lead_paragraph: The coach known for the Miracle on Ice at the 1980 Olympics has a legacy that touches all five universities playing Division I hockey in the state.

headline.main: Herb Brooks’s Miracle in Minnesota: Spreading Division I Hockey
headline.print_headline: Olympic Coach’s Miracle in Minnesota: Spreading Division I Hockey
